level.heading: Definitions.
level.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:
"Board" means the Board of Directors of the Not-for-Profit Hospital Corporation.
"Corporation" means the Not-for-Profit Hospital Corporation established by ยง 44-951.02.
"Fund" means the Not-for-Profit Hospital Corporation Fund established by ยง 44-951.03.
The acute care hospital on the site;
The hospital building on the site;
All furnishings, fixtures, equipment, supplies, and related amenities located in the acute care hospital and the hospital building; and
Any other operations located within the hospital building or on the site, and contracts, leases, or other agreements related to those operations.
"Site" means the land comprised of approximately 17 acres at 1310 and 1350 Southern Avenue, S.E.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: Law 19-21, the "Fiscal Year 2012 Budget Support Act of 2011", was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 19-203, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 25, 2011, and June 14, 2011, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 22, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 19-98 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 19-21 became effective on September 14, 2011.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Short title: Section 5111 of D.C. Law 19-21 provided that subtitle L of title V of the act may be cited as "Not-for-Profit Hospital Corporation Establishment Amendment Act of 2011".
